content: in this legal case there was a dispute over the division of community property between two parties referred to as xx and yy dd xx requested the termination of the property division and changes to the land register the court ordered both parties to cover the procedural costs after one year and one month the court approved a compromise agreement and terminated the proceedings the parties agreed to divide the property car and pension shares and requested changes to the land registry they also agreed to bear the costs equally the court ordered the return of half of the state fee paid by both parties the compromise agreement is valid upon enforcement but can be annulled or withdrawn under certain circumstances the court may continue the proceedings if the compromise is legally binding the parties have the right to appeal the court order within a specified deadline the text also mentions other parties involved in the case such as xxxxxxxxxxx oü ergo insurance se seb pank and bigbank the court has made decisions regarding the division of liabilities and the transfer of ownership the parties have requested the court to execute the order and confirm the compromise they also ask for the return of half of the paid state fees the court has the authority to terminate the proceedings if the compromise is legal and does not violate public interest the text also explains the process of transferring real estate and changing ownership entries as well as the division of assets in an inheritance the court has determined that the compromise is in line with the interests of minor children involved in the case the court has ordered the submission of the compromise to the land register and has allocated and determined the reimbursement of costs the parties have agreed to a shortened deadline for filing an appeal
